name: Elara Meadowlight

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

racial_traits.name: Fey Ancestry
racial_traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

racial_traits.name: Two Skills
racial_traits.description: You have proficiency in two skills of your choice (Perception and Insight).

racial_traits.name: Extra Language
racial_traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice (Halfling).

class_features.name: Expertise
class_features.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies (Stealth, Thieves' Tools).

class_features.name: Sneak Attack
class_features.description: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

class_features.name: Thieves' Cant
class_features.description: You know thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation.

class_features.name: Cunning Action
class_features.description: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

class_features.name: Fast Hands
class_features.description: You can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check, use your thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock, or take the Use an Object action.

class_features.name: Second-Story Work
class_features.description: You gain the ability to climb faster than normal; climbing no longer costs you extra movement. In addition, when you make a running jump, the distance you cover increases by a number of feet equal to your Dexterity modifier.

starting_equipment.name: Thieves' Tools
starting_equipment.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

starting_equipment.name: Burglar's Pack
starting_equipment.description: Includes a backpack, a bag of 1,000 ball bearings, 10 feet of string, a bell, 5 candles, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, a hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days rations, a tinderbox, a waterskin, and 50 feet of hempen rope strapped to the side of it.

starting_equipment.name: Smith's Tools
starting_equipment.description: These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade.

starting_equipment.name: Artisan's Clothing
starting_equipment.description: Well-made clothing befitting someone who works with their hands.

personality_traits: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
ideals: People. I'm loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.
bonds: A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating, and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
flaws: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
